code: export default function validateInfo(values){var errors={};if(!values.fullname.trim()){errors.fullname='Full name required';}else if(!/^[A-Za-z]+/.test(values.fullname.trim())){errors.name='Enter a valid name';}if(!values.email.trim()){errors.email='Email required';}else if(!/\S+@\S+\.\S+/.test(values.email)){errors.email='Email address is invalid';}if(!values.destination.trim()){errors.destination='Destination required';}if(!values.date){errors.date='Departure date required';}if(!values.time){errors.time='Departure time required';}return errors;}
